DOC.brief_summary: To determine the safety and efficacy of sub-antimicrobial dose COL-101 in the treatment of patients who have both blepharitis and facial rosacea
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Patients With Blepharitis and Facial Rosacea
DOC.criteria: blepharitis facial rosacea pregnant or nursing women allergy to tetracyclines recent eye surgery past or current use of isotretinoin patients who are achlorhydric patients who have had gastric bypass surgery
